attributes.action: army memorial at the national arboretum
attributes.additional_details: It is with regret that the Prime Minister deems it a suitable approach for the proposed memorial for the Afghan War to be funded by penalties upon banks for bad practice.  With all due respect, the people of this country from all sections of this community would like to show their respect for the commitment of the army in protecting the interests of this country.  Any other approach would commercialises National Remembrance.
